result.title: 13 quantitative briefing on the case studies
result.description: D5.2 - 13 quantitative briefings on the case studies, presenting data collected in Task 5.2 in the 13 locations where the local case studies are implemented. Quantitative briefings will cover both MATILDE Social Dimensions (MSDs) and MATILDE Economic Dimensions (MEDs). Specific attention will be placed on the impact of reception services for asylum seekers and refugees.

result.title: Action plan on mobilisation and mutual learning
result.description: The mobilization and mutual learning action plan intends to bring various stakeholders together to have a dialogue about different interests, motivations, hopes and uncertainties associated with drones/UAM vehicles. Through having a discourse, knowledge and experiences are pooled and participants can learn from each other. Within USpace4UAM possible discussants might be developers of drone technologies, scientists, physicians, political institutions and society. In the project this event will be planned and organized by DLR. Suitable methods are for example focus groups or world cafes. Since focus groups are already planned for the project, both activities could be linked. Another option is to have discussions after the flight demos between developers and persons, who watched at or took part in the demos as study participants.
